price: Et ne vous penchez pas vers les injustes : sinon le Feu vous atteindrait. Vous n’avez pas d’alliés en dehors d’Allah. Et vous ne serez pas secourus.
arabic: وَلَا تَرۡكَنُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ فَتَمَسَّكُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مِنۡ أَوۡلِيَآءَ ثُمَّ لَا تُنصَرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walā tarkanū ilā alladhīna ẓalamū fatamassakumu al-nāru wamā lakum min dūni al-lahi min awliyāa thumma lā tunṣarūna
